NiStep.idl

00001 // NiStep.idl : IDL source for NiStep
00002 //
00003 
00004 // This file will be processed by the MIDL tool to
00005 // produce the type library (NiStep.tlb) and marshalling code.
00006 
00007 import "oaidl.idl";
00008 import "ocidl.idl";
00009 
00010 interface IAttributeList;
00011 interface IAttribute;
00012 interface INode;
00013 interface IStepPath;
00014 interface  INodeList;
00015 
00016 
00017 typedef struct 
00018 {
00019   double x;
00020   double y;
00021   double z;
00022 } Vector3d;
00023 
00024 typedef enum  {
00025   unknown_ = 0, /* 0 catches uninit. errors */
00026   special_=1, /* placeholder, given meaning by it's owner, */
00027   this_=2,
00028 
00029   integer_=3,
00030   real_=4,
00031   string_=5,
00032   binary_=6,
00033   boolean_=7,
00034   logical_=8,
00035 
00036   /* formals-only */
00037   number_=9,
00038   generic_=10,
00039 
00040   /* aggregates */
00041   aggregate_=11,  /* as a formal */
00042   array_=12,
00043   bag_=13,
00044   set_=14,
00045   list_=15,
00046   list_item_=16,/* not real, just for easier computation */
00047 
00048   oneof_=17,
00049 
00050   /* while they are really used for different */
00051   /* purposes, it might be worth considering */
00052   /* collapsing entity_ and entity_list_ */
00053   entity_=18, /* single entity */
00054   entity_list_=19,  /* linked list of entities */
00055   enumeration_=20,
00056   select_=21,
00057   reference_=22,  /* something only defined by a base type, i.e., a */
00058   /* type reference */
00059   query_=23,
00060   op_=24,   /* something with an operand */
00061   inverse_=25,  /* is? an inverse */
00062 
00063   identifier_=26, /* simple identifier in an expression */
00064   attribute_=27,  /* attribute reference (i.e., expr->u.variable) */
00065   derived_=28,/*?*/
00066   funcall_=29,  /* a function call and actual parameters */
00067   //  selection_=30,
00068   self_=31,
00069   vardef_=32,
00070   typereference_=33,
00071   underlying_type_=34,
00072   constant_=35,
00073   index_=36,
00074   rename_=37,
00075   typelist_=38,
00076   typemultilist_=39,
00077   nulltype_=-1
00078 } StepNodeType;
